ygData.subject: Re: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 3 ... breaking ... a ... Yeah, I got the werebat wing about 2 minutes after zoning in...but when I went for the eye...well i was the only one capable of
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>
> hehe i thought the globe was the worst. I camped for 3 hours just to get
3
> globes for myself and 2 other necros, but it was a pain in the butt
breaking
> into the area since it was just me and another necro (i was 30 he was 32)
> when the task began. We were finally able to get a high level nec to come
> in and break the spawn for us and he left and another nec joined in.
>
> I just hung around unrest and asked if i could loot the items i needed for
> the quest, matter of fact, there was a high level nec in there killing
> fungus, and was shouting that anyone could loot the eyes. The werebat was
a
> piece of cake.

Yeah, I got the werebat wing about 2 minutes after zoning in...but when I
went for the eye...well i was the only one capable of getting down there :)
and no one else was clearing the spots around it. It was kind of fun, if
not nerve rattling sitting in that pit where the fungus spawns, knowing
there were 3 hags directly above me :)
